entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to snow or ice pellets after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Local ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
